definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The police caught the teenager Allan of full hand blood in the spot.
sentences.chinese: 警察在現場抓到了滿手鮮血的少年艾倫。

sentences.english: At the moment, we have our hands full with economic issues.
sentences.chinese: 我們目前有滿手的經濟問題要處理。
